# 글로벌 시황

```{r echo = FALSE, message = F, comment = NA, results = 'markup'}

options(warn = -1)
Sys.setenv(TZ = "Asia/Seoul")

'%ni%' = Negate('%in%')

if(weekdays(Sys.Date()) %ni% c("Saturday", "Sunday","Monday") & ("00:00:00" < format(Sys.time(), "%X")) & (format(Sys.time(), "%X") < "09:00:00")==TRUE) {
  DATE = format(Sys.Date()-1,"%Y/%m/%d",tz = "Asia/Seoul")
} else if(weekdays(Sys.Date())=="Saturday"){
  DATE = format(Sys.Date()-1,"%Y/%m/%d",tz = "Asia/Seoul")
} else if(weekdays(Sys.Date())=="Sunday"){
  DATE = format(Sys.Date()-2,"%Y/%m/%d",tz = "Asia/Seoul")
} else if(weekdays(Sys.Date()) == "Monday" & ("00:00:00" < format(Sys.time(), "%X")) & (format(Sys.time(), "%X") < "09:00:00") == TRUE){
  DATE = format(Sys.Date()-3,"%Y/%m/%d",tz = "Asia/Seoul")
} else {
  DATE = format(Sys.Date(),"%Y/%m/%d",tz = "Asia/Seoul")
}

{
  if(!require(sparkline)) install.packages("sparkline")
  if(!require(rvest)) install.packages("rvest")
  if(!require(formattable)) install.packages("formattable")
  if(!require(htmlwidgets)) install.packages("htmlwidgets")
}

library(sparkline); library(rvest); library(formattable)

ticker = c('%5EGSPC','%5EDJI','%5EIXIC',"%5EFTSE",'%5EGDAXI','%5EFCHI','000001.SS','399001.SZ','%5EN225','%5ETWII','%5EKS11','GC=F','CL=F')

############################## FNCT ##############################

market_intra = function(wticker){
  n = 1
  tex = paste0('https://query1.finance.yahoo.com/v8/finance/chart/',wticker,'?region=US&lang=en-US&includePrePost=false&interval=1m&useYfid=true&range=',n,'d&corsDomain=finance.yahoo.com&.tsrc=finance') %>%
    read_html() %>%
    html_node('body') %>%
    html_text(trim = TRUE)
  
  if(grepl("open",tex) != TRUE){
    n=2
    tex = paste0('https://query1.finance.yahoo.com/v8/finance/chart/',wticker,'?region=US&lang=en-US&includePrePost=false&interval=1m&useYfid=true&range=',n,'d&corsDomain=finance.yahoo.com&.tsrc=finance') %>%
      read_html() %>%
      html_node('body') %>%
      html_text(trim = TRUE)
  } 
  
  a = strsplit(tex,'\\[*\\=?]')[[1]]
  
  indi = c("timestamp","open","high","low","close","volume")
  
  df = a[grep(indi[1],x=a)] %>% strsplit(.,",") %>% .[[1]] %>%
    gsub(pattern = "[a-z]|[\":{}[]",replacement ="",x=.) %>%
    .[-which(.[1]=="")] %>% as.data.frame()
  
  for (i in 2:length(indi)) {
    
    df1 = a[grep(indi[i],x=a)] %>% strsplit(.,",") %>% .[[1]] %>%
      gsub(pattern = "[a-z]|[\":{}[]",replacement ="",x=.) %>%
      .[-which(.[1]=="")] %>% as.numeric() %>% as.data.frame()
    
    df = cbind(df,df1)
  }
  
  colnames(df) = indi
  
  if(wticker %in% ticker[c(1:3,12,13)]){
    tzone = "EST"
  } else if(wticker %in% ticker[c(4:6)]){
    tzone = "CET"
  } else if(wticker %in% ticker[c(7,8,10)]){
    tzone = "Asia/Shanghai"
  } else {
    tzone = "Asia/Seoul"
  }
  
  for (i in 1:nrow(df)) df[i,1] = format(as.POSIXct(as.numeric(df[i,1]),origin = "1970-01-01",tz=tzone),"%H:%M") 
  
  df
}

################################################################

dfw = data.frame()

{
  for (i in 1:(length(ticker)-2)) {
    url = paste0('https://finance.yahoo.com/quote/',ticker[i],'/')
    
    dfw[i,1] = url %>% read_html() %>% html_nodes(xpath = '//*[@id="quote-header-info"]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1]/h1') %>% html_text(trim=TRUE)
    dfw[i,2] = url %>%
      read_html() %>% html_nodes(xpath = '//*[@id="quote-header-info"]/div[3]/div[1]/div/span[1]') %>%
      html_text(trim = TRUE) %>%
      gsub(x=.,",","") %>% as.numeric()
    
    cp = url %>%
      read_html() %>% html_nodes(xpath = '//*[@id="quote-header-info"]/div[3]/div[1]/div/span[2]') %>%
      html_text(trim = TRUE) %>% strsplit(x=.," ") %>% .[[1]]
    
    dfw[i,3] = cp[1]  
    dfw[i,4] = cp[2] %>% gsub(x=.,"\\(|)","")
  }
  colnames(dfw) = c("indices","Last Price","Chg","% Change")
  dfw$"Vol" = NA
  dfw$"Vol_Bar" = NA
  dfw$"Intraday Chart" = NA
  row.names(dfw) = NULL
  dfw$"MARKET" = NA
}


for (i in 1:11) {
  try({
  dfw[i,5] = market_intra(ticker[i])[[6]] %>% tail(.,n=1)
  dfw[i,6] = as.character(htmltools::as.tags(sparkline(market_intra(ticker[i])[[6]],type =
                                                         'bar',width = 100)))
  dfw[i,7] = as.character(htmltools::as.tags(sparkline(market_intra(ticker[i])[[5]],type =
                                                         'line',width = 100)))
  
  url = paste0("https://finance.yahoo.com/quote/",ticker[i],"?p=",ticker[i])
  tex = url %>%
    read_html() %>%
    html_nodes(xpath = '//*[@id="quote-market-notice"]/span') %>%
    html_text()
  
  dfw[i,8] = ifelse(grepl(pattern = "close",x=tex)==TRUE,"CLOSE","OPEN")
  },silent = T)
}

dfw[which(is.na(dfw[5])),5] = 0

dfc = data.frame()
for (i in 12:13) {
  url = paste0('https://finance.yahoo.com/quote/',ticker[i],'?p=',ticker[i],'&.tsrc=fin-srch')
  
  dfc[i-11,1] = url %>% read_html() %>% html_nodes(xpath = '//*[@id="quote-header-info"]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1]/h1') %>% html_text(trim=TRUE)
  dfc[i-11,2] = url %>%
    read_html() %>% html_nodes(xpath = '//*[@id="quote-header-info"]/div[3]/div[1]/div/span[1]') %>%
    html_text(trim = TRUE) %>%
    gsub(x=.,",","") %>% as.numeric()
  
  cp = url %>%
    read_html() %>% html_nodes(xpath = '//*[@id="quote-header-info"]/div[3]/div[1]/div/span[2]') %>%
    html_text(trim = TRUE) %>% strsplit(x=.," ") %>% .[[1]]
  
  dfc[i-11,3] = cp[1]  
  dfc[i-11,4] = cp[2] %>% gsub(x=.,"\\(|)","")
  dfc[i-11,5] = url %>%
    read_html() %>%
    html_nodes(xpath = '//*[@id="quote-summary"]/div[2]/table/tbody/tr[3]/td[2]/span') %>%
    html_text(trim = TRUE) %>% gsub(x=.,",","") %>% as.numeric()
}




colnames(dfc) = c("indices","Last Price","Chg","% Change","Volume")
dfc$"Intraday Chart" = NA
dfc$"MARKET" = NA


for (i in c(12,13)) {
  tex = paste0('https://finance.yahoo.com/quote/',ticker[12],'?p=',ticker[12],'&.tsrc=fin-srch') %>%
    read_html() %>%
    html_nodes(xpath = '//*[@id="quote-market-notice"]/span') %>%
    html_text()
  dfc[i-11,7] = ifelse(grepl(pattern = "close",x=tex)==TRUE,"CLOSE","OPEN")
}


for (i in c(12,13)) {
  dfc[i-11,6] = as.character(htmltools::as.tags(sparkline(market_intra(ticker[i])[[5]],type =
                                                            'line',width = 100)))
}
```

## 미국 시황

```{r echo = FALSE, message = F, comment = NA, results = 'asis'}

dfus = dfw[1:3,]

dfus = formattable(dfus, align = c("l","r","c","c","r","c","c","c"), list(
  indices = formatter("span",style = x~style(font.weight = "bold")),
  Chg = formatter("span", style = x ~ style(
    font.weight = "bold",
    color = ifelse(grepl(x=dfus[,3],"-")!=TRUE,"#2a9688", ifelse(grepl(x=dfus[,3],"-")==TRUE, "#e35d5d", "black")))),
  `% Change` = formatter("span",
                         style = x ~ style(color = ifelse(grepl(x=dfus[,4],"-")==TRUE , "red", "green")),
                         x ~ icontext(ifelse(grepl(x=dfus[,4],"-")==TRUE, "arrow-down", "arrow-up"), x)),
  MARKET = formatter("span",
                     style = x ~ style(font.weight ="bold",
                                       color = ifelse(x == "OPEN","green","red")))))

out = as.htmlwidget(formattable(dfus))
out$dependencies = c(out$dependencies, htmlwidgets:::widget_dependencies("sparkline", "sparkline"))
out

url = 'http://www.nanumtrading.com/마켓뉴스/뉴욕-증시/' %>%
  read_html() %>%
  html_nodes('a') %>% html_attr('href') %>% .[78]

tex = url %>% 
  read_html() %>%
  html_nodes(xpath = '//*[@id="content"]/div[1]') %>%
  html_nodes("p") %>%
  html_text(trim = TRUE) %>%
  .[-which(.=="")] %>%
  .[grep("현지시간",.):length(.)]

for (i in 1:length(tex)) {
  cat(tex[i],"\n")

}
```

```{r echo = FALSE, message = F, comment = NA, results = 'asis'}
    html_nodes(xpath = '//article[@class="thumbgroup"]') %>%

  } else {
    url[i] = NA
  }
}

  read_html() %>%
  html_nodes('p') %>%
  html_text(trim = TRUE) %>%
  .[grep("=뉴스핌",x=.):tail(grep("newspim.com",x=.)-1,n=1)] 

tex[1] = substr(x=tex[1],gregexpr(pattern = '=뉴스핌',text=tex[1])[[1]][1]+14,nchar(tex[1]))

for (i in 1:length(tex)) {
  cat(tex[i],"\n")
  cat("\n")
}
```

```{r echo = FALSE, message = F, comment = NA, results = 'asis'}
content = "%s<br><br>"

tex = 'http://m.infostock.co.kr/daily/worldIndex.asp?mode=w&STYPE=JP' %>%
    read_html(encoding = 'euc-kr') %>%
    html_nodes(xpath = '//div[@class="txtContent"]') %>% as.character() %>%
    strsplit(x=.,split = '\r\n\t') %>% .[[1]] %>% .[3] %>% strsplit(x=.,split = "<br>") %>% .[[1]]
if(length(which(tex==""))==0){
  tex = tex
} else {
  tex = tex[-which(tex=="")]
}
dat = ifelse(length(grep("작성일자",tex)) == 0,DATE,
             tex[length(tex)] %>% substr(.,gregexpr('작성일자',.)[[1]][1]+7,nchar(.)-7) %>% .[1])
if(DATE == dat) {
  for (i in 1:(length(tex)-2)){
   cat(sprintf(content,tex[i]))
  }
} else {
  cat(sprintf(content,"마감시황은 장 마감 후 제공됩니다. 현재 준비 중 입니다."))
}

```

```{r echo = FALSE, message = F, comment = NA, results = 'asis'}
}
dat = ifelse(length(grep("작성일자",tex)) == 0,DATE,
             tex[length(tex)] %>% substr(.,gregexpr('작성일자',.)[[1]][1]+7,nchar(.)-7) %>% .[1])

if(DATE == dat) {
  for (i in 1:(length(tex)-2)){
   cat(sprintf(content,tex[i]))
  }
} else {
  cat(sprintf(content,"마감시황은 장 마감 후 제공됩니다. 현재 준비 중 입니다."))
}

```
